Reviews.Title: OK for casual use but keep a charger nearby
Reviews.Author: loce_the_wizard "loce_the_wizard"
Reviews.Content: This LG Optimus Elite Silver Sprint Smart Phone works OK but it has terrible battery life, requiring daily charging or the thing just dies. It feels somewhat flimsy to me, as though it would shatter if dropped on a carpet, but others might consdier it lightweigh or streamlined. There is nothing particularly remarkable or novel about this phone but it does perform OK for a casual user who does not need all the extras and who does not live or die by the speed of his or her phone.Look for a used one and consider this an option as a backup or starter phone.

Reviews.Title: ALMOST EXACTLY NEW!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: when it came in i thought well this is odd i bought a used one but it has like nothing wrong with it! only tiny scratches by the charger (expected) but it is an epicly awesome phone i would recomend

Reviews.Title: My damn Phone!
Reviews.Author: DANA MOULTRIE
Reviews.Content: This phone is too  good to be true, it does everything and Iove it to pieces! Please don't pass up on the offer of great quality!

Reviews.Title: Lg
Reviews.Author: Blake Osterling
Reviews.Content: Overall didn't have a problem with it but when it came in the mail, I didn't receive a battery and it really made me mad.

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: Angela Winkel
Reviews.Content: Had to call Sprint tech support right away because the WiFi would not work at all luckily they fixed it and it works now.

Reviews.Title: Lg phone
Reviews.Author: chafane gordon
Reviews.Content: Works well but isn't unlocked. Had problems with sprint when I tried to activate it. Besides that, the phone works and look just as advertised

ProductInfo.Name: Sprint LG Optimus Elite Bluetooth Android GPS NFC Phone
